VEGETARIAN: A 𝘥𝘪𝘦𝘵 where you do not eat meat.

VEGAN: A 𝘭𝘪𝘧𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘺𝘭𝘦 excluding meat from your diet & animal biproduct (leathers, furs, cosmetics) from your life as well.

The replacement of meat with plant-based substitutes is an inevitable consequence of capitalism. Large-scale purveyors have an obligation to shareholders to cut costs, and it will ultimately always end up costing less to grow plants directly than to raise plant-eating animals.

People treat the supplantation of fossil fuels with renewable energy sources and of meat with plant-based substitutes as some kind of leftist or socialist effort.

But really both are inevitable processes of capitalism, just like email supplanting paper mail was.
